title: Lemon Juice Challenge! + Does Amy Know Her Rock Music? + Did Eddie Sell His Personalized Bobby Bones book?
itunes:title: Lemon Juice Challenge! + Does Amy Know Her Rock Music? + Did Eddie Sell His Personalized Bobby Bones book?
description:
Bobby brought the "Lemon Juice Challenge" into the studio after hearing about a man setting a world record. The show members try to drink straight lemon juice for COLD HARD CASH!! Amy wore her Guns-n-Roses t-shirt to work today so Bobby quizzed her on her knowledge of the band. Plus, Eddie's personalized copy of Bobby's book showed up at a local book store! Eddie tries to defend himself...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
